entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing late this evening. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:49 PM EST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:49 PM EST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the evening. Wind becoming north 30 before morning. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:49 PM EST Monday 06 March 2023
